modes.Berlin Tegel airport: There is no direct subway or train connection to Tegel Airport. Various buses and express buses operated by BVG (Berlin Transport Services) have stops located right outside Terminal A and B. Take TXL Bus / TXL JetExpressBus to Hauptbahnhof. From Hauptbahnhof S+U station take the S-Bahn S75 (direction S Wartenberg ) to Berlin Ostbahnhof. It is a short 5-minute walk to the venue.
modes.Berlin Schönefeld airport: Take the Airport Express (RE7 & RB14) regional train to Berlin Ostbahnhof. Travel Time: 15 minutes, trains run between 4:40am - 11:00pm. It is a short 5-minute walk to the venue.
modes.Berlin Subway (tube):
The closest subway station to the venue is Berlin Ostbahnhof.
Metro: S-Bahn lines: S3, S5, S7, S75 and S9
Warschauer Strasse lines:U1, U15 and U12
Alexanderplatz lines: U2, U5, U8
modes.Rail: From Berlin Hauptbahnhof (main station) trains leave frequently to Berlin Ostbahnhof. It’s a 7-minute ride and from there a short 5-minute walk to the venue.
modes.Bus: Berlin Ostbahnhof is served by bus lines 140, 147, 347.
modes.Car: We strongly advise against coming to the venue by car, as parking is very difficult. We encourage you to take advantage of the comprehensive public transport system.
